EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal Partner Days_2017.Austin_SWintegration_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you at Pivotal Partner Days, Austin!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend Pivotal Partner Days taking place in Austin.
In the past, partners who have attended Partner Days have been able to significantly fast track their integration with the Pivotal Cloud Foundry platform. We hope you'll find it as valuable as well.
Pivotal Partner Days - Austin, TX Pre-event Training: Tuesday, February 21, 2017 (Only for those who have registered) Software Integration Workshop: Wednesday, February 22 - Thursday, February 23, 2017 How to prepare/agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/partner-days/austin/software-integration-workshop]]>
When: February 22-23, 2017 Where: VMware, 3900 N Capital of Texas Hwy, Suite 500, Austin, TX 78746 Map & Directions <[[https://goo.gl/maps/8eSFEDZNjow]]>
Parking and Building Access: Parking is located in garage 3700. All VMware guests must park directly to the right of the garage entrance.
Upon arrival, please sign in at 5th floor reception desk.
Need to be added to the Pivotal Partners Slack Channel? Contact Guido Westenberg at gwestenberg@pivotal.io <[[mailto:gwestenberg@pivotal.io]]>.
Questions? Please contact Jamie De Martini at jdemartini@pivotal.io <[[mailto:jdemartini@pivotal.io]]>.
- Pivotal Cloud Foundry ISV Engineering Team
